title: Watch Face - Athletica
summary: Watch Face - Athletica is stylish and modern clock! Adjustable vibration hourly!
description: Athletica is stylish and modern clock!Large numbers - easy to recognize the time, you can also display the time in the format hh: mm on the dial.Customizable vibration will help you not to get lost in time.Key features:★ 2 types of arrows★ Hourly vibration★ Date★ Double time★ Ambient mode★ Round (Moto 360, LG G Watch R) and Square (LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony Smartwath 3) designHourly vibration, second arrow, date and time is configured in the settings of your watch. Enjoy!INSTALL NOTES:After installing the application, new styles of watches appear in the menu selection of watch faces in your Android Wear after 10-20 seconds. If you encounter problems with the installation of watch faces on Wear, please go to the android wear app -> Settings and "Resync apps"
descriptionHTML:
Athletica is stylish and modern clock!
Large numbers - easy to recognize the time, you can also display the time in the format hh: mm on the dial.
Customizable vibration will help you not to get lost in time.

Key features:
★ 2 types of arrows
★ Hourly vibration
★ Date
★ Double time
★ Ambient mode
★ Round (Moto 360, LG G Watch R) and Square (LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony Smartwath 3) design

Hourly vibration, second arrow, date and time is configured in the settings of your watch. Enjoy!


INSTALL NOTES:
After installing the application, new styles of watches appear in the menu selection of watch faces in your Android Wear after 10-20 seconds. If you encounter problems with the installation of watch faces on Wear, please go to the android wear app -> Settings and "Resync apps"
